name: 陳政順
objective: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Reliability and Material selection
3. Load and stress analysis
4. Deflection and stiffness
5. Failure resulting from static loading
6. Fatigue failure resulting from variable loading
   Midterm
7. Shaft design
8. Design of nonpermnent and permanentjoints
9. Mechanical spring
10. Rolling contact bearings and journal bearing
11. Gear design
12. Flexible Mechanical elements
   Final Exam
scorePolicy: 作業,課堂表現, 期中考, 期末考
materials: Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design (9th edition in SI units) international edition 2011 by Budynas & Nisbett
